name: Featured Post Widget – Link to Category
author: Brian Myrick

sections.description:
Some people like to have their posts link to a “stacked list” of articles instead of the full
article. This modification to the Genesis Featured Post Widget adds a checkbox to the widget
configuration that will tell the widget to link to the category page instead of linking to
the article directly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Modification of StudioPress Featured Post Widget that enables an override link to the category.
description:
